text: Elin Lerum Boasson (born 28 May 1978) is a Norwegian environmentalist and was chairman of Natur og Ungdom in 2001 and 2002.Elin Lerum Boasson at University of Stavanger, translated to English, access date January 2010. She became active in the organisation in 1991, and joined the board in 1997 before she was elected deputy chairman in 1999. She has a Master of Political Science degree from the University of Oslo and has since 2005 worked at Nansen Institute as a researcher (as of 2009).Elin Lerum Boasson at Fridtjof Nansen Institute, translated to English, access date January 2010. ==References== Category:Norwegian environmentalists Category:Norwegian women environmentalists Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Nature and Youth activists Category:University of Oslo alumni
title: Elin Lerum Boasson
